name: Survival of the Hippest
overview:
Why leave your Twittername (or Hashtag) stuck on the screen when you can wear it proudly around your neck or on your Keychain in Sterling Silver or 14k Gold?

We think our Twitter ID Necklaces and Keychains are poised to be the hottest gift item of the season. In fact, we’ve been stalked in Starbucks and accosted in Airports all across the country by people clamoring to get their hands on them.

â€¨â€¨Twitter ID Necklaces are an ironic twist on the Nameplate trend for the Social Media crowd. We’ve rescued legions of Tweeters from Twittername obscurity and designed some really hot jewelry to boot. Why leave your Twittername (or Hashtag) stuck on the screen when you can wear it proudly around your neck or on your Keychain in Sterling Silver or 14k Gold? Our thoughts exactly.

â€¨â€¨Check us out at survivalofthehippest.com and see what all the fuss is about…(and please let me if you have any questions at all).
